title: Listen to a deep dive conversation about Gemini 2.0.

excerpt: The Google AI: Release Notes podcast dedicated its most recent episode to the release of Gemini 2.0. Host Logan Kilpatrick chatted with Tulsee Doshi, the head of product…
text: The Google AI: Release Notes podcast dedicated its most recent episode to the release of Gemini 2.0. Host Logan Kilpatrick chatted with Tulsee Doshi, the head of product for Gemini models, to discuss how Gemini has evolved since launching 1.0 last year, and what to expect from our newest, most capable model yet.Watch the video below for the full conversation.
html:
The Google AI: Release Notes podcast dedicated its most recent episode to the release of Gemini 2.0. Host Logan Kilpatrick chatted with Tulsee Doshi, the head of product for Gemini models, to discuss how Gemini has evolved since launching 1.0 last year, and what to expect from our newest, most capable model yet.

Watch the video below for the full conversation.
